# LaTeX Helper Extension

VS Code extension for easier LaTeX editing with focus on thesis writing.

## Features
- Quick insert snippets (figures, tables, citations)
- Bibliography helper with .bib file search
- Section navigator tree view
- Figure/table manager with unused label detection
- Smart thesis templates
- Live stats panel (word count, citations, compilation status)

## Development
- Language: TypeScript
- Extension API: VS Code Extension API
- Build: npm run compile
- Test: F5 to launch Extension Development Host
